name: NiceCook
description:
Rules are simple, you have to hold on to your peel and use it to bake and deliver a pizza in under a minute.

However, make sure you don't go off the marked sides and don't run out of time!

To move, you can only use these two buttons:

  • arrow keys and A & D on your keyboard
  • L1 & R1 or L2 & R2 on your gamepad

               

This is my first GameJam game and the first game I finish making. Any feedback is welcome!
